sen.j: 上北山温泉（かみきたやまおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡上北山村（旧国大和国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Kamikitayama Onsen Hot Spring is the hot spring which is located in Kamikitayama-mura, Yoshino-gun Nara Prefecture.
Kamikitayama Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Kamikitayama-mura, Yoshino-gun Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato province).
sen.cmt: 訳漏れあり、「（旧国大和国）」の訳を追記。is the hot spring →is a hot spring
sen.e: Kamikitayama Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Kamikitayama-mura, Yoshino-gun Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato province).

sen.j: 車 西名阪自動車道郡山インターチェンジ (奈良県)から国道24号 国道309号を経て、大淀町から国道169号を熊野方面へ。
sen.e: By car: Go through National Route 24 and 309 from Nishimeihan Jidoshado Expressway Koriyama Interchange (Nara Prefecture), and then take National Route 169 from Oyodo Town to Kumano.
By car: Go through National Route 24 and 309 from Nishimeihan Jidoshado Expressway Koriyama Interchange (Nara Prefecture), and then take National Route 169 from Oyodo Town toward Kumano.
By car: Go through National Route 24 and 309 from Nishimeihan Jidoshado Expressway Koriyama Interchange (Nara Prefecture), and then take National Route 169 from Oyodo Town toward Kumano.

sen.j: または名阪国道針インターチェンジから国道369号を南下し、国道370号を経て国道169号を熊野方面へ。
sen.e: Or go down National Route 369 from Meihan National Route Hari Interchange, and go through National Route 370, and then take National Route 169 to Kumano.
Or go National Route 369 down south from Meihan National Route Hari Interchange, and go through National Route 370, and then take National Route 169 toward Kumano.
Or go National Route 369 down south from Meihan National Route Hari Interchange, and go through National Route 370, and then take National Route 169 toward Kumano.

sen.j: 鉄道 近畿日本鉄道吉野線大和上市駅から奈良交通バス 湯盛温泉杉の湯行きで終点乗り継ぎ、池原方面行きで約2時間。
sen.e: By railway: Take Nara Kotsu Bus bound for Yumori Hot Spring Sugi no yu from Kintetsu Yoshino line Yamato-Kamiichi Station, and change at the last stop for Ikehara.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: By railway: Take Nara Kotsu Bus bound for Yumori Hot Spring Sugi no yu from Kintetsu Yoshino line Yamato-Kamiichi Station, and change at the last stop for Ikehara.
By railway: Take Nara Kotsu Bus bound for Yumori Hot Spring Sugi no yu from Kintetsu Yoshino line Yamato-Kamiichi Station, and change at the last stop for Ikehara.
It takes approximately two hours.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It takes approximately two hours.
It takes approximately two hours.

sen.j: ナトリウム - 炭酸水素塩泉
sen.e: Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline
Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline
Sodium hydrocarbonate springsalkaline

sen.j: 河合集落の少し北、北山川筋に日帰り入浴施設「薬師湯」があり、隣に「ふれあいの郷ホテルかみきた」がある。
sen.e: There is a day visit spa "Yakushiyu hot spring" along Kitayama-gawa River, a little north of Kawai village, and next to it, there is a "Fureainosato Hotel Kamikita."
There is a day visit spa "Yakushiyu hot spring" along the Kitayama-gawa River, a little north of Kawai village, and next to the spa, there is a "Fureainosato Hotel Kamikita."
sen.cmt: Kitayama-gawa River に定冠詞theを付与、next to it → next to the spa
sen.e: There is a day visit spa 'Yakushiyu hot spring' along the Kitayama-gawa River, a little north of Kawai village, and next to the spa, there is a 'Fureainosato Hotel Kamikita'.

sen.j: 昔から北山川の畔に温泉が湧出していた。
sen.e: Since early times, hot spring water has gushed forth at the shore of Kitayama-gawa River.
Since early times, hot spring water has gushed forth on the riverside of Kitayama-gawa River.
sen.cmt: at the shore → on the riverside
sen.e: Since early times, hot spring water has gushed forth on the riverside of Kitayama-gawa River.

sen.j: 温泉として開発が行われたのは1987年で、同年にボーリングを行って源泉開発した後、温泉施設ができた。
sen.e: Development of hot springs in this area had started in 1987, and after the source of hot spring was developed by boring, hot spring facilities were built.
Development of hot springs in this area had started in 1987, and after the source of hot spring was developed by boring, hot spring facilities were built.
Development of hot springs in this area had started in 1987, and after the source of hot spring was developed by boring, hot spring facilities were built.
